verses.verse: Now <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> had <S%H6239>riches<s%> and <S%H3519>honor<s%> in <S%H7230>abundance;<s%> and he joined <S%H2859>affinity<s%> with <S%H256>Ahab.<s%>

<S%H7093>After<s%> certain <S%H8141>years<s%> he went <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H256>Ahab<s%> to <S%H8111>Samaria.<s%> <S%H256>Ahab<s%> <S%H2076>killed<s%> <S%H6629>sheep<s%> and <S%H1241>cattle<s%> for him in <S%H7230>abundance,<s%> and for the <S%H5971>people<s%> who were with <S%H5496>him,<s%> and moved him to go <S%H5927>up<s%> with him to Ramoth <S%H7433>Gilead.<s%>

<S%H256>Ahab<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> "Will you <S%H3212>go<s%> with me to Ramoth <S%H7433>Gilead?<s%>" He <S%H559>answered<s%> <S%H5971>him,<s%> "I am as you are, and my people as your <S%H5971>people.<s%> We will be with you in the <S%H4421>war.<s%>"
<S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> "Please <S%H1875>inquire<s%> <S%H3117>first<s%> for the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>"

Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> gathered the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> <S%H6908>together,<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3212>them,<s%> "Shall we go to Ramoth <S%H7433>Gilead<s%> to <S%H4421>battle,<s%> or shall I <S%H2308>forbear?<s%>" They <S%H559>said,<s%> "Go <S%H5927>up;<s%> for <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H5414>deliver<s%> it into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king.<s%>"
But <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5030>"Isn't<s%> there here a prophet of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1875>besides,<s%> that we may inquire of him?"

The <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat,<s%> "There is yet <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> by whom we may <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> but I <S%H8130>hate<s%> <S%H5012>him,<s%> for he never prophesies <S%H2896>good<s%> concerning <S%H3117>me,<s%> but always <S%H7451>evil.<s%> He is <S%H4321>Micaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3229>Imla.<s%>" <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4428>"Don't<s%> let the king say <S%H559>so.<s%>"

Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H259>an<s%> <S%H5631>officer,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Get <S%H4319>Micaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3229>Imla<s%> <S%H4116>quickly.<s%>"

Now the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> on his <S%H3678>throne,<s%> <S%H3847>arrayed<s%> in their <S%H899>robes,<s%> and they were <S%H3427>sitting<s%> in an open <S%H1637>place<s%> at the <S%H8179>entrance<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria;<s%> and all the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> were <S%H5012>prophesying<s%> before <S%H6440>them.<s%>

<S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3668>Chenaanah<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> him <S%H7161>horns<s%> of <S%H1270>iron,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H5055><s%> 'With these you shall push the <S%H758>Syrians,<s%> until they are <S%H3615>consumed.<s%>'"

All the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> <S%H559>so,<s%> saying, "Go <S%H5927>up<s%> to Ramoth <S%H7433>Gilead,<s%> and <S%H6743>prosper;<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H5414>deliver<s%> it into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king.<s%>"

The <S%H4397>messenger<s%> who <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H7121>call<s%> <S%H4321>Micaiah<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H559>him,<s%> saying, <S%H1697>"Behold,<s%> the words of the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> declare <S%H2896>good<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> with <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H259>mouth.<s%> Let your <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H259>therefore,<s%> please be like one of <S%H1696>theirs,<s%> and speak <S%H2896>good.<s%>"
<S%H4321>Micaiah<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "As <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H2416>lives,<s%> what my <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>says,<s%> that will I <S%H1696>speak.<s%>"

When he had <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4318>him,<s%> "Micaiah, shall we <S%H3212>go<s%> to Ramoth <S%H7433>Gilead<s%> to <S%H4421>battle,<s%> or shall I <S%H2308>forbear?<s%>" He <S%H559>said,<s%> "Go <S%H5927>up,<s%> and <S%H6743>prosper.<s%> They shall be <S%H5414>delivered<s%> into your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>"

The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6471>him,<s%> "How many times shall I <S%H7650>adjure<s%> you that you <S%H1696>speak<s%> to me nothing but the <S%H571>truth<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh?<s%>"

He <S%H559>said,<s%> "I <S%H7200>saw<s%> all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6327>scattered<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> as <S%H6629>sheep<s%> that have no <S%H7462>shepherd.<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H113><s%> 'These have no master. Let them <S%H7725>return<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H1004>house<s%> in <S%H7965>peace.<s%>'"

The <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat,<s%> <S%H559>"Didn't<s%> I tell you that he would not <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> concerning <S%H7451>me,<s%> but evil?"

Micaiah <S%H559>said,<s%> "Therefore <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> I <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H3427>sitting<s%> on his <S%H3678>throne,<s%> and all the <S%H6635>army<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> <S%H5975>standing<s%> on his right <S%H3225>hand<s%> and on his <S%H8040>left.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6601><s%> 'Who shall entice <S%H256>Ahab<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that he may go <S%H5927>up<s%> and <S%H5307>fall<s%> at Ramoth <S%H7433>Gilead?<s%>' One <S%H559>spoke<s%> <S%H559>saying<s%> in this <S%H3602>way,<s%> and another <S%H559>saying<s%> in that <S%H3602>way.<s%>

A <S%H7307>spirit<s%> came <S%H3318>out,<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6601><s%> 'I will entice <S%H3068>him.<s%>' "Yahweh said to <S%H559>him,<s%> 'How?'

"He <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3318><s%> 'I will go forth, and will be a <S%H8267>lying<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> in the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of all his <S%H5030>prophets.<s%>' "He <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6601><s%> 'You will entice <S%H3201>him,<s%> and will prevail <S%H3318>also.<s%> Go forth, and do <S%H6213>so.<s%>'

"Now <S%H3068>therefore,<s%> behold, Yahweh has <S%H5414>put<s%> a <S%H8267>lying<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> in the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of these your <S%H5030>prophets;<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken<s%> evil concerning <S%H7451>you.<s%>"

<S%H4321>Micaiah<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7200>"Behold,<s%> you shall see on that <S%H3117>day,<s%> when you shall <S%H935>go<s%> into an <S%H2315>inner<s%> <S%H2315>room<s%> to hide <S%H2244>yourself.<s%>"

The <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3947>"Take<s%> <S%H4321>Micaiah,<s%> and carry him <S%H7725>back<s%> to <S%H526>Amon<s%> the <S%H8269>governor<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and to <S%H3101>Joash<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1121>son;<s%>

and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H559><s%> 'Thus says the <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H7760>"Put<s%> this fellow in the <S%H1004>prison,<s%> and <S%H398>feed<s%> him with <S%H3899>bread<s%> of <S%H3906>affliction<s%> and with <S%H4325>water<s%> of <S%H3906>affliction,<s%> until I <S%H7725>return<s%> in <S%H7965>peace.<s%>"'"

<S%H4321>Micaiah<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "If you <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H7725>at<s%> all in <S%H7965>peace,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has not <S%H1696>spoken<s%> by <S%H559>me.<s%>" He said, <S%H8085>"Listen,<s%> you <S%H5971>peoples,<s%> all of you!"
So the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> to Ramoth <S%H7433>Gilead.<s%>

The <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat,<s%> "I will <S%H2664>disguise<s%> <S%H935>myself,<s%> and go into the <S%H4421>battle;<s%> but you <S%H3847>put<s%> on your <S%H899>robes.<s%>" So the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2664>disguised<s%> <S%H935>himself;<s%> and they went into the <S%H4421>battle.<s%>

Now the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Syria<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of his <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3898>"Fight<s%> neither with <S%H6996>small<s%> nor <S%H1419>great,<s%> except only with the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>"

It <S%H8269>happened,<s%> when the captains of the <S%H7393>chariots<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat,<s%> that they <S%H559>said,<s%> "It is the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel!<s%>" Therefore they turned <S%H5437>around<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> against <S%H3092>him.<s%> But Jehoshaphat cried <S%H2199>out,<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5826>helped<s%> <S%H430>him;<s%> and God moved them to depart from <S%H5496>him.<s%>

The <S%H4421>battle<s%> <S%H5927>increased<s%> that <S%H3117>day.<s%> However the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> propped himself <S%H5975>up<s%> in his <S%H4818>chariot<s%> <S%H5227>against<s%> the <S%H758>Syrians<s%> until the <S%H6153>evening;<s%> and about the <S%H6256>time<s%> of the going <S%H935>down<s%> of the <S%H8121>sun,<s%> he <S%H4191>died.<s%>
